title: SongGen: A Single Stage Auto-regressive Transformer for Text-to-Song Generation
author: Zihan Liu (Beihang University), Shuangrui Ding (The Chinese University of Hong Kong), Zhixiong Zhang (Shanghai AI Laboratory), Xiaoyi Dong (Shanghai AI Laboratory), Pan Zhang (Shanghai AI Laboratory), Yuhang Zang (Shanghai AI Laboratory), Yuhang Cao (Shanghai AI Laboratory), Dahua Lin (The Chinese University of Hong Kong), Jiaqi Wang (Shanghai AI Laboratory)
relevance_why: This paper discusses advancements in generative models for music creation, particularly relevant for Haohe Liu's research in audio generation and restoration techniques.
background: Song generation using a transformer model that takes text inputs to produce vocals and instrumental music tracks.
contribution: This paper introduces SongGen, a single-stage auto-regressive transformer model designed for controllable text-to-song generation, achieving competitive performance in generating harmonious vocal and instrumental tracks.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Previous methods often employed multi-stage generation processes for music creation, leading to complexity and rigidity.
technical_comparison.novelty: This work simplifies the process into a single-stage model, enhancing flexibility and control over generated song attributes.

key_innovation: Integrates both component generation (vocals and instruments) yet allows fine-tuned control using multiple input modalities (lyrics, instrument type, mood).
real_world_impact: The model can democratize music creation, enabling both amateurs and professionals to generate music easily, having potential applications in music production, entertainment, and educational fields.
limitations: The model may still struggle with generating clear and expressive vocals due to inherent challenges in mixing them with accompaniment.

new_terms.auto-regressive transformer: **Auto-regressive transformer** refers to a model that generates data sequentially, predicting the next element based on previous elements, commonly used in language and audio generation tasks.
new_terms.text-to-song generation: **Text-to-song generation** is the process of creating musical compositions from textual descriptions, encompassing both lyrics and instrumental tracks.

open_sourcing: The authors plan to release model weights, training code, annotated data, and a preprocessing pipeline to promote collaboration and further research.
